name: joe-reporter-console
description: Console Reporter for the Joe Testing Framework
readme:
# Console Reporter for the Joe Testing Framework [![NPM version](https://badge.fury.io/js/joe-reporter-console.png)](https://npmjs.org/package/joe-reporter-console) [Installation and usage instructions here.](https://github.com/bevry/joe/wiki/Using-Custom-Reporters) Reporter name: `console` ## History You can discover the history inside the [History.md](https://github.com/bevry/joe-reporter-console/blob/master/History.md#files) file ## License Licensed under the incredibly [permissive](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Permissive_free_software_licence) [MIT License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/MIT/)
